13544.example_1: sen'āsanaleso nāma itthan'nāmasen'āsanavāsiko diṭṭho hoti pārājikaṃ dhammaṃ ajjhāpajjanto.

70391.example_1: aparaṃ pana, bhante, etadānuttariyaṃ, yathā bhagavā dhammaṃ deseti bhassasamācāre. idha, bhante, ekacco na c'eva musāvādupasañhitaṃ vācaṃ bhāsati na ca vebhūtiyaṃ na ca pesuṇiyaṃ na ca sārambhajaṃ jay'āpekkho, mantā mantā ca vācaṃ bhāsati nidhānavatiṃ kālena.
70391.example_2: musā ca so na bhaṇati, atho na khīṇabyappatho, atho vebhūtiyaṃ n'āha, mantā atthaṃ ca bhāsati.
70391.commentary: (DNa) na ca vebhūtiyan'ti bhassasamācāre ṭhito'pi bhedakaravācaṃ na bhāsati. (SNPa) vibhūtī'ti vināso, vibhūtiṃ kāsati karoti vā'ti vibhūtikaṃ, vibhūtikam'eva vebhūtikaṃ, vebhūtiyan'ti'pi vuccati, pesuññass'etaṃ adhivacanaṃ. tañ'hi sattānaṃ aññam'aññato bhedanena vināsaṃ karoti. sesaṃ uttānattham'eva. (DNt) vibhūti vuccati visuṃbhāvo, tattha niyuttan'ti vebhūtikaṃ, tadeva vebhūtiyaṃ, pesuññaṃ. ten'āha bhedakaravācan'ti.

52133.example_1: tena kho pana samayena bhagavā tadah'uposathe pannarase puṇṇāya puṇṇamāya rattiyā bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto ajjhokāse nisinno hoti.
52133.example_2: das'āh'ānāgataṃ kattikatemāsikapuṇṇamaṃ bhikkhuno pan'eva accekacīvaraṃ uppajjeyya, accekaṃ maññamānena bhikkhunā paṭiggahetabbaṃ

52493.meaning_2: small coin, (the value of which is about an anna)
52493.example_1: rajataṃ nāma kahāpaṇo lohamāsako dārumāsako jatumāsako ye vohāraṃ gacchanti.
52493.commentary: (VINa) tadā rājagahe vīsatimāsako kahāpaṇo hoti, tasmā pañcamāsako pādo.

21346.example_1: idaṃ me, bhante, kosiyamissakaṃ santhataṃ kārāpitaṃ nissaggiyaṃ. im'āhaṃ saṅghassa nissajjāmī'ti
21346.comment: in the context refer to robe and also pp have passive meaning anyway

26005.example_1: ukkaṭṭho nāma patto aḍḍh'āḷhak'odanaṃ gaṇhāti catubhāgaṃ khādanaṃ tadupiyaṃ byañjanaṃ.
26005.commentary: (VINa) catubhāgaṃ khādanan'ti odanassa catutthabhāgappamāṇaṃ khādanaṃ, taṃ hatthahāriyassa muggasūpassa vasena veditabbaṃ.

54419.example_1: kāḷakaṃ nāma dve kāḷakāni, jātiyā kāḷakaṃ vā rajanakāḷakaṃ vā.

63586.example_1: taṃ kissa hetu? sukhumattā, bhikkhave, attabhāvassa. evaṃ mahā kho, bhikkhave, apāyo.

23743.example_1: duddadaṃ dadāti, dukkaraṃ karoti, dukkhamaṃ khamati, guyham'assa āvi karoti, guyham'assa pariguhati, āpadāsu na jahati, khīṇena n'ātimaññati. imehi kho, bhikkhave, sattahi aṅgehi samannāgato mitto sevitabbo'ti.

71783.grammar: nt, abstr, in comps, from na ni
71783.example_1: atha kho te, pāpima, bhikkhū kakusandhena bhagavatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena evaṃ ovadiyamānā evaṃ anusāsiyamānā araññagatā'pi rukkhamūlagatā'pi suññāgāragatā'pi asubh'ānupassino kāye vihariṃsu, āhāre paṭikūlasaññino, sabbaloke anabhiratisaññino, sabbasaṅkhāresu anicca-anupassino.
71783.commentary: (MNa) anicc'ānupassī'ti ettha aniccaṃ veditabbaṃ, anicc'ānupassanā veditabbā, anicc'ānupassī veditabbo. tattha aniccan'ti pañcakkhandhā, te hi uppādavay'aṭṭhena aniccā. anicc'ānupassanā'ti pañcakkhandhānaṃ khayato vayato dassanañāṇaṃ. anicc'ānupassī'ti tena ñāṇena samannāgato puggalo. tasmā anicc'ānupassī viharatī'ti aniccato anupassanto viharatī'ti ayam'ettha attho.

21068.meaning_1: pursuit of sense pleasure (in); indulgence in sense gratification (in); devotion to hedonistic enjoyment
21068.meaning_2: pursuit of the enjoyment of sensual pleasures
21068.example_1: yo c'āyaṃ kāmesu kāmasukh'allik'ānuyogo hīno gammo pothujjaniko anariyo anatthasañhito
21068.commentary: (SNa) yo c'āyaṃ kāmesu kāmasukh'allik'ānuyogo'ti yo ca ayaṃ vatthukāmesu kilesakāmasukhassa anuyogo.
21068.comment: so all partis can be found in DPD

3225.example_1: saṅghamajjhe nissajjitabbo. sabbeh'eva adhiṭṭhitapattaṃ gahetvā sannipatitabbaṃ. na lāmako patto adhiṭṭhātabbo, mah'agghaṃ pattaṃ gahessāmī'ti.

58545.meaning_1: should be gathered together; should be assembled
58545.example_1: evañ'ca pana, bhikkhave, vūpasametabbaṃ. sabbeh'eva ekajjhaṃ sannipatitabbaṃ, sannipatitvā byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena saṅgho ñāpetabbo.
58545.example_2: saṅghamajjhe nissajjitabbo. sabbeh'eva adhiṭṭhitapattaṃ gahetvā sannipatitabbaṃ. na lāmako patto adhiṭṭhātabbo, mah'agghaṃ pattaṃ gahessāmī'ti.

27085.example_1: ayaṃ me, bhante, patto ūnapañcabandhanena pattena cetāpito nissaggiyo. im'āhaṃ saṅghassa nissajjāmī'ti.

41868.example_1: tena kho pana samayena saṅghassa sāṭiyaggāhāpako na hoti... pattaggāhāpako na hoti... ārāmikapesako na hoti... sāmaṇerapesako na hoti. sāmaṇerā apesiyamānā kammaṃ na karonti.
41868.example_2: pañcah'aṅgehi samannāgato bhikkhu pattaggāhāpako sammannitabbo, yo na chand'āgatiṃ gaccheyya, na dos'āgatiṃ gaccheyya, na moh'āgatiṃ gaccheyya, na bhay'āgatiṃ gaccheyya, gāhitāgāhitañca jāneyya.
41868.commentary: (ANa) pattaggāhāpako'ti yo ca tassā bhikkhuparisāya pattapariyanto, so tassa bhikkhuno padātabbo'ti ettha vuttapattaggāhāpako.

24858.meaning_2: who causes to take or hold

4560.example_1: anuddayataṃ paṭicca kathaṃ kathessāmī'ti paresaṃ dhammo desetabbo.
4560.example_2: sace thero gaṇhāti, therassa patto dutiyassa gāhetabbo. na ca tassa anuddayatāya na gahetabbo. yo na gaṇheyya, āpatti dukkaṭassa.

24701.example_1: sace thero gaṇhāti, therassa patto dutiyassa gāhetabbo. na ca tassa anuddayatāya na gahetabbo. yo na gaṇheyya, āpatti dukkaṭassa.

6158.construction:
na > a + √pā + ta + ka
apatta + ka
6158.example_1: yo na gaṇheyya, āpatti dukkaṭassa. apattakassa na gāhetabbo. eten'eva upāyena yāva saṅghanavakā gāhetabbā.

57011.meaning_1: most junior monk in the community
57011.example_1: apattakassa na gāhetabbo. eten'eva upāyena yāva saṅghanavakā gāhetabbā.

2948.example_1: tena bhikkhunā so patto na adese nikkhipitabbo, na abhogena bhuñjitabbo, na vissajjetabbo, kath'āyaṃ patto nasseyya vā vinasseyya vā bhijjeyya vā'ti? sace adese vā nikkhipati abhogena vā bhuñjati vissajjeti vā, āpatti dukkaṭassa.

73491.meaning_1: improper use; use in an unsuitable way
73491.example_1: tena bhikkhunā so patto na adese nikkhipitabbo, na abhogena bhuñjitabbo, na vissajjetabbo, kath'āyaṃ patto nasseyya vā vinasseyya vā bhijjeyya vā'ti? sace adese vā nikkhipati abhogena vā bhuñjati vissajjeti vā, āpatti dukkaṭassa.

78740.meaning_1: should be disposed of; should be got rid of
78740.example_1: upāhanā puñchantena paṭhamaṃ sukkhena coḷakena puñchitabbā, pacchā allena. upāhanāpuñchanacoḷakaṃ dhovitvā ekam'antaṃ vissajjetabbaṃ.
78740.example_2: tena bhikkhunā so patto na adese nikkhipitabbo, na abhogena bhuñjitabbo, na vissajjetabbo, kath'āyaṃ patto nasseyya vā vinasseyya vā bhijjeyya vā'ti?

34428.example_1: abandhanena pattena ekabandhan'okāsaṃ pattaṃ … dvibandhan'okāsaṃ pattaṃ … tibandhan'okāsaṃ pattaṃ… catubandhan'okāsaṃ pattaṃ cetāpeti, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.

30680.example_1: abandhanena pattena ekabandhan'okāsaṃ pattaṃ … dvibandhan'okāsaṃ pattaṃ … tibandhan'okāsaṃ pattaṃ… catubandhan'okāsaṃ pattaṃ cetāpeti, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.

25996.example_1: abandhanena pattena ekabandhan'okāsaṃ pattaṃ … dvibandhan'okāsaṃ pattaṃ … tibandhan'okāsaṃ pattaṃ… catubandhan'okāsaṃ pattaṃ cetāpeti, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.

35507.example_1: anāpatti naṭṭhapattassa, bhinnapattassa, ñātakānaṃ pavāritānaṃ, aññass'atthāya, attano dhanena, ummattakassa, ādikammikassā'ti.

49999.meaning_1: whose bowl is broken; whose bowl is cracked
49999.example_1: anāpatti naṭṭhapattassa, bhinnapattassa, ñātakānaṃ pavāritānaṃ, aññass'atthāya, attano dhanena, ummattakassa, ādikammikassā'ti.

3224.example_1: saṅghamajjhe nissajjitabbo. sabbeh'eva adhiṭṭhitapattaṃ gahetvā sannipatitabbaṃ. na lāmako patto adhiṭṭhātabbo, mah'agghaṃ pattaṃ gahessāmī'ti.

18279.example_1: yo, bhikkhave, evaṃ vadeyya, yathā yath'āyaṃ puriso kammaṃ karoti tathā tathā taṃ paṭisaṃvediyatī'ti, evaṃ santaṃ, bhikkhave, brahmacariyavāso na hoti, okāso na paññāyati sammā dukkhassa antakiriyāya.
18279.example_2: abandhan'okāso nāma patto yassa dv'aṅgulā rāji na hoti. bandhan'okāso nāma patto yassa dv'aṅgulā rāji hoti. navo nāma patto viññattiṃ upādāya vuccati.

78997.meaning_2: who causes to take or hold
78997.example_1: tena kho pana samayena saṅghassa sāṭiyaggāhāpako na hoti... pattaggāhāpako na hoti... ārāmikapesako na hoti... sāmaṇerapesako na hoti. sāmaṇerā apesiyamānā kammaṃ na karonti.
78997.example_2: pañcah'aṅgehi samannāgato bhikkhu pattaggāhāpako sammannitabbo, yo na chand'āgatiṃ gaccheyya, na dos'āgatiṃ gaccheyya, na moh'āgatiṃ gaccheyya, na bhay'āgatiṃ gaccheyya, gāhit'āgāhitañ'ca jāneyya.
78997.commentary: (ANa) sāṭiyaggāhāpako'ti vassikasāṭikāya gāhāpako. pattaggāhāpako'ti yo ca tassā bhikkhuparisāya pattapariyanto, so tassa bhikkhuno padātabbo'ti ettha vuttapattaggāhāpako.

57829.example_1: idaṃ me, bhante, bhesajjaṃ satt'āh'ātikkantaṃ nissaggiyaṃ, im'āhaṃ saṅghassa nissajjāmī'ti

1450.example_1: so evaṃ vicuṇṇitamakkhito taṅkhaṇaññ'eva antarahita-vaṇṇa-gandha-saṅkhāra-viseso suvānadoṇiyaṃ ṭhitasuvānavamathu viya paramajegucchabhāvaṃ upagacchati. evarūpo'pi samāno cakkhussa āpāthaṃ atītattā ajjhoharitabbo hotī'ti evaṃ paribhogato paṭikkūlatā paccavekkhitabbā.
1450.example_2: nissaṭṭhaṃ paṭilabhitvā na kāyikena paribhogena paribhuñjitabbaṃ, na ajjhoharitabbaṃ, padīpe vā kāḷavaṇṇe vā upanetabbaṃ, aññena bhikkhunā kāyikena paribhogena paribhuñjitabbaṃ, na ajjhoharitabbaṃ.
1450.commentary: (VISMa) cakkhussa āpāthaṃ atītattā ajjhoharitabbo hotī'ti ukkaṃsagataṃ tassa paṭikkūlabhāvaṃ vibhāveti.

21564.example_1: ālokasandhiparikammāyā'ti vātapānaparikammāya setavaṇṇaṃ kāḷavaṇṇaṃ gerukaparikammaṃ mālākammaṃ latākammaṃ makaradantakaṃ pañcapaṭikaṃ.
21564.example_2: nissaṭṭhaṃ paṭilabhitvā na kāyikena paribhogena paribhuñjitabbaṃ, na ajjhoharitabbaṃ, padīpe vā kāḷavaṇṇe vā upanetabbaṃ, aññena bhikkhunā kāyikena paribhogena paribhuñjitabbaṃ, na ajjhoharitabbaṃ.

5858.meaning_1: within seven days; within a week
5858.example_1: anāpatti antosatt'āhaṃ adhiṭṭheti, vissajjeti, nassati, vinassati, ḍayhati, acchinditvā gaṇhanti, vissāsaṃ gaṇhanti, anupasampannassa cattena vantena muttena anapekkho datvā paṭilabhitvā paribhuñjati, ummattakassa, ādikammikassā'ti.

26115.example_1: yathodhi kho pan'assa cattaṃ hoti vantaṃ muttaṃ pahīnaṃ paṭinissaṭṭhaṃ, so buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgatomhī'ti labhati atthavedaṃ, labhati dhammavedaṃ, labhati dhamm'ūpasaṃhitaṃ pāmojjaṃ.
26115.example_2: anāpatti antosatt'āhaṃ adhiṭṭheti, vissajjeti, nassati, vinassati, ḍayhati, acchinditvā gaṇhanti, vissāsaṃ gaṇhanti, anupasampannassa cattena vantena muttena anapekkho datvā paṭilabhitvā paribhuñjati, ummattakassa, ādikammikassā'ti.
26115.synonym: jahita, paṭinissaṭṭha, pariccattapahīna, vijahita, vitiṇṇa, vippahīna, vossaṭṭha

43997.meaning_1: sought for; searched for; looked for
43997.example_1: idaṃ me, bhante, vassikasāṭikacīvaraṃ atirekamāse sese gimhāne pariyiṭṭhaṃ atirek'addhamāse sese gimhāne katvā paridahitaṃ nissaggiyaṃ.

43523.example_1: idaṃ me, bhante, vassikasāṭikacīvaraṃ atirekamāse sese gimhāne pariyiṭṭhaṃ atirek'addhamāse sese gimhāne katvā paridahitaṃ nissaggiyaṃ.

19083.meaning_1: baths in rain; washes in rain
19083.meaning_2: causes to make wet through rain
19083.example_1: satiyā vassikasāṭikāya naggo kāyaṃ ovassāpeti, āpatti dukkaṭassa. ūnakamāse sese gimhāne atirekasaññī, āpatti dukkaṭassa.

17308.example_1: ūnakamāse sese gimhāne vematiko, āpatti dukkaṭassa. ūnakamāse sese gimhāne ūnakasaññī, anāpatti.

17298.example_1: ūnak'addhamāse sese gimhāne vematiko, āpatti dukkaṭassa. ūnak'addhamāse sese gimhāne ūnakasaññī, anāpatti.

13992.meaning_1: is postponed; is put off; is delayed
13992.example_1: pariyiṭṭhāya vassikasāṭikāya vassaṃ ukkaḍḍhiyyati, nivatthāya vassikasāṭikāya vassaṃ ukkaḍḍhiyyati, dhovitvā nikkhipitabbaṃ, samaye nivāsetabbaṃ, acchinnacīvarassa, naṭṭhacīvarassa, āpadāsu, ummattakassa, ādikammikassā'ti.

35318.meaning_1: having washed; having cleaned; having rinsed
35318.meaning_2: having washed, having rinsed, having cleansed
35318.example_1: sace yāgu hoti, bhājanaṃ dhovitvā yāgu upanāmetabbā. yāguṃ pītassa udakaṃ datvā bhājanaṃ paṭiggahetvā nīcaṃ katvā sādhukaṃ appaṭighaṃsantena dhovitvā paṭisāmetabbaṃ.
35318.example_2: pariyiṭṭhāya vassikasāṭikāya vassaṃ ukkaḍḍhiyyati, nivatthāya vassikasāṭikāya vassaṃ ukkaḍḍhiyyati, dhovitvā nikkhipitabbaṃ, samaye nivāsetabbaṃ, acchinnacīvarassa, naṭṭhacīvarassa, āpadāsu, ummattakassa, ādikammikassā'ti.

16137.meaning_1: perceiving (someone) as a higher ordained monastic
16137.example_1: upasampanne upasampannasaññī uyyojeti, āpatti pācittiyassa. upasampanne vematiko uyyojeti, āpatti pācittiyassa. upasampanne anupasampannasaññī uyyojeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
16137.example_2: upasampanne upasampannasaññī cīvaraṃ datvā kupito anattamano acchindati vā acchindāpeti vā, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.

4765.meaning_1: perceiving (someone) as not a higher ordained monastic
4765.example_1: upasampanne upasampannasaññī uyyojeti, āpatti pācittiyassa. upasampanne vematiko uyyojeti, āpatti pācittiyassa. upasampanne anupasampannasaññī uyyojeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
4765.example_2: upasampanne anupasampannasaññī cīvaraṃ datvā kupito anattamano acchindati vā acchindāpeti vā, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.

69458.example_1: anāpatti, so vā deti, tassa vā vissasanto gaṇhāti, ummattakassa ādikammikassā'ti.

20116.example_1: dātā ca ahosi sukhumānaṃ mudukānaṃ attharaṇānaṃ pāvuraṇānaṃ khomasukhumānaṃ kappāsikasukhumānaṃ koseyyasukhumānaṃ kambalasukhumānaṃ
20116.example_2: suttaṃ nāma cha suttāni, khomaṃ kappāsikaṃ koseyyaṃ kambalaṃ sāṇaṃ bhaṅgaṃ.
20116.notes: six types of robe-cloth 1. khoma, 2. kappāsika, 3. koseyya, 4. kambala, 5. sāṇa, 6. bhaṅga

23217.example_1: dātā ca ahosi sukhumānaṃ mudukānaṃ attharaṇānaṃ pāvuraṇānaṃ khomasukhumānaṃ kappāsikasukhumānaṃ koseyyasukhumānaṃ kambalasukhumānaṃ
23217.example_2: suttaṃ nāma cha suttāni, khomaṃ kappāsikaṃ koseyyaṃ kambalaṃ sāṇaṃ bhaṅgaṃ.
23217.notes: six types of robe-cloth 1. khoma, 2. kappāsika, 3. koseyya, 4. kambala, 5. sāṇa, 6. bhaṅga

66875.meaning_1: had woven (by); caused to be woven
66875.example_1: idaṃ me, bhante, cīvaraṃ sāmaṃ suttaṃ viññāpetvā tantavāyehi vāyāpitaṃ nissaggiyaṃ. im'āhaṃ saṅghassa nissajjāmī'ti

66876.meaning_1: perceiving (something) as caused to be woven
66876.example_1: vāyāpite vāyāpitasaññī, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ. vāyāpite vematiko, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.

10453.meaning_1: not had woven (by); not caused to be woven

10454.meaning_1: perceiving (something) as not caused to be woven
10454.example_1: vāyāpite vematiko, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ. vāyāpite avāyāpitasaññī, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.

62976.example_1: anāpatti, cīvaraṃ sibbetuṃ, āyoge, kāyabandhane, aṃsabandhake, pattatthavikāya, parissāvane, ñātakānaṃ, pavāritānaṃ, aññass'atthāya, attano dhanena, ummattakassa, ādikammikassā'ti.

10978.example_1: anāpatti, cīvaraṃ sibbetuṃ, āyoge, kāyabandhane, aṃsabandhake, pattatthavikāya, parissāvane, ñātakānaṃ, pavāritānaṃ, aññass'atthāya, attano dhanena, ummattakassa, ādikammikassā'ti.

47896.example_1: anāpatti, cīvaraṃ sibbetuṃ, āyoge, kāyabandhane, aṃsabandhake, pattatthavikāya, parissāvane, ñātakānaṃ, pavāritānaṃ, aññass'atthāya, attano dhanena, ummattakassa, ādikammikassā'ti.

41877.example_1: anāpatti, cīvaraṃ sibbetuṃ, āyoge, kāyabandhane, aṃsabandhake, pattatthavikāya, parissāvane, ñātakānaṃ, pavāritānaṃ, aññass'atthāya, attano dhanena, ummattakassa, ādikammikassā'ti.

31465.example_1: parisā c'assa hoti bāhullikā. laddhaṃ laddhaṃ kolambe'pi ghaṭe'pi pūretvā paṭisāmeti, parissāvanāni'pi thavikāyo'pi pūretvā vātapānesu laggeti. tāni olīnavilīnāni tiṭṭhanti.
31465.example_2: anāpatti, cīvaraṃ sibbetuṃ, āyoge, kāyabandhane, aṃsabandhake, pattatthavikāya, parissāvane, ñātakānaṃ, pavāritānaṃ, aññass'atthāya, attano dhanena, ummattakassa, ādikammikassā'ti.

47322.example_1: tantavāyehī'ti pesakārehi vāyāpeti, payoge payoge dukkaṭaṃ. paṭilābhena nissaggiyaṃ hoti.

66878.example_1: anāpatti, ñātakānaṃ, pavāritānaṃ, aññass'atthāya, attano dhanena, mah'agghaṃ vāyāpetu'kāmassa app'agghaṃ vāyāpeti, ummattakassa, ādikammikassā'ti.

66879.example_1: anāpatti, ñātakānaṃ, pavāritānaṃ, aññass'atthāya, attano dhanena, mah'agghaṃ vāyāpetu'kāmassa app'agghaṃ vāyāpeti, ummattakassa, ādikammikassā'ti.

39857.example_1: cīvaradānasamayo nāma anatthate kathine vassānassa pacchimo māso, atthate kathine pañcamāsā, cīvaradānasamayo'ti bhuñjitabbaṃ.
39857.example_2: cīvarakālasamayo nāma anatthate kathine vassānassa pacchimo māso, atthate kathine pañcamāsā.

19887.meaning_1: day of the removal of the kathina privileges
19887.example_1: atthate kathine kathin'uddhāradivasaṃ atikkāmeti, nissaggiyaṃ hoti. nissajjitabbaṃ saṅghassa vā gaṇassa vā puggalassa vā.

19886.example_1: so taṃ cīvar'āsaṃ payirupāsati. tassa sā cīvar'āsā upacchijjati. tassa bhikkhuno ās'āvacchediko kathin'uddhāro.
19886.example_2: atthate kathine kathin'uddhāradivasaṃ atikkāmeti, nissaggiyaṃ hoti. nissajjitabbaṃ saṅghassa vā gaṇassa vā puggalassa vā.
19886.comment: it seems at least from BMC and Vibhanga context - it is about ending of privileges

15256.example_1: bhikkhu atthatakathino katacīvaraṃ ādāya pakkamati, na paccessanti. tassa bhikkhuno pakkaman'antiko kathin'uddhāro.
15256.example_2: atthate kathine kathin'uddhāradivasaṃ atikkāmeti, nissaggiyaṃ hoti. nissajjitabbaṃ saṅghassa vā gaṇassa vā puggalassa vā.

1010.example_1: accekacīvare accekacīvarasaññī cīvarakālasamayaṃ atikkāmeti, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ. accekacīvare vematiko cīvarakālasamayaṃ atikkāmeti, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.

51468.meaning_1: percipient of killing; conscious of killing
51468.commentary: (VINa) tathā hi'ssa tam'ev'ātthaṃ dassento, maraṇasaññī'tiādim'āha. yasmā c'ettha saṅkappo'ti na'y'idaṃ vitakkassa nāmaṃ. atha kho saṃvidahanamattass'etaṃ adhivacanaṃ.

54783.meaning_1: perceiving as in private; regarding as alone
54783.example_1: sāmaṃ, adhiṭṭhāya, dūtena, dūtaparaṃparāya, visakkiyena dūtena, gatapaccāgatena dūtena, araho rahosaññī, raho arahosaññī, araho arahosaññī, raho rahosaññī

3478.meaning_1: perceiving (something) as not an extraordinary robe
3478.example_1: accekacīvare vematiko cīvarakālasamayaṃ atikkāmeti, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ. accekacīvare anaccekacīvarasaññī cīvarakālasamayaṃ atikkāmeti, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.

3477.meaning_1: not an extraordinary robe; non-urgent robe

5859.example_1: anāpatti, antosamaye adhiṭṭheti, vikappeti, vissajjeti, nassati, vinassati, ḍayhati, acchinditvā gaṇhanti, vissāsaṃ gaṇhanti, ummattakassa, ādikammikassā'ti.

38201.example_1: sāsaṅkaṃ nāma tasmiṃ magge corānaṃ niviṭṭh'okāso dissati, bhutt'okāso dissati, ṭhit'okāso dissati, nisinn'okāso dissati, nipann'okāso dissati.

2289.example_1: idaṃ me, bhante, cīvaraṃ atirekachārattaṃ vippavuṭṭhaṃ, aññatra bhikkhusammutiyā, nissaggiyaṃ.

68507.meaning_1: lived apart from; been absent from; separated from
68507.example_1: idaṃ me, bhante, cīvaraṃ atirekachārattaṃ vippavuṭṭhaṃ, aññatra bhikkhusammutiyā, nissaggiyaṃ.

2288.example_1: atirekachāratte vematiko vippavasati, aññatra bhikkhusammutiyā, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ. atirekachāratte ūnakasaññī vippavasati, aññatra bhikkhusammutiyā, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.

66501.meaning_1: having lived; having stayed; having remained
66501.meaning_2: having lived, having abided, having dwelt, having stayed
66501.example_1: ayācito tat'āgacchi, n'ānuññāto ito gato, kutoci nūna āgantvā, vasitvā katip'āhakaṃ, ito'pi aññena gato, tato'p'aññena gacchati.
66501.example_2: anāpatti, chārattaṃ vippavasati, ūnakachārattaṃ vippavasati, chārattaṃ vippavasitvā puna gāmasīmaṃ okkamitvā vasitvā pakkamati, anto chārattaṃ paccuddharati, vissajjeti, nassati, vinassati, ḍayhati, acchinditvā gaṇhanti, vissāsaṃ gaṇhanti, bhikkhusammutiyā, ummattakassa, ādikammikassā'ti.

43443.meaning_2: changed into, appropriated, turned to somebody's use
43443.example_1: idaṃ me, bhante, jānaṃ saṅghikaṃ lābhaṃ pariṇataṃ attano pariṇāmitaṃ nissaggiyaṃ. im'āhaṃ saṅghassa nissajjāmī'ti

43432.meaning_1: perceiving (something) as allocated; regarding (something) as designated

6355.meaning_1: perceiving (something) as not allocated; regarding (something) as not designated
6355.example_1: apariṇate vematiko, āpatti dukkaṭassa. apariṇate apariṇatasaññī, anāpatti.

1586.example_1: saṅghassa pariṇataṃ aññasaṅghassa vā cetiyassa vā pariṇāmeti, āpatti dukkaṭassa. cetiyassa pariṇataṃ aññacetiyassa vā saṅghassa vā puggalassa vā pariṇāmeti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.

1504.example_1: saṅghassa pariṇataṃ aññasaṅghassa vā cetiyassa vā pariṇāmeti, āpatti dukkaṭassa. cetiyassa pariṇataṃ aññacetiyassa vā saṅghassa vā puggalassa vā pariṇāmeti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.

1568.example_1: puggalassa pariṇataṃ aññapuggalassa vā saṅghassa vā cetiyassa vā pariṇāmeti, āpatti dukkaṭassa. apariṇate pariṇatasaññī, āpatti dukkaṭassa.

6353.meaning_1: not allocated; not designated; not diverted

33961.example_1: anāpatti kattha demā'ti pucchiyamāno yattha tumhākaṃ deyyadhammo paribhogaṃ vā labheyya paṭisaṅkhāraṃ vā labheyya ciraṭṭhitiko vā assa yattha vā pana tumhākaṃ cittaṃ pasīdati tattha dethā'ti bhaṇati, ummattakassa, ādikammikassā'ti.

40812.example_1: anāpatti kattha demā'ti pucchiyamāno yattha tumhākaṃ deyyadhammo paribhogaṃ vā labheyya paṭisaṅkhāraṃ vā labheyya ciraṭṭhitiko vā assa yattha vā pana tumhākaṃ cittaṃ pasīdati tattha dethā'ti bhaṇati, ummattakassa, ādikammikassā'ti.
